review: Used ofloxacin for 3 days as directed, eye got worse with each drop, inflammed, redder, burning, and itching. On third day eye swelled shut, had to discontinue using at third day. Making appointment with an opthamologist tomorrow.
Horrible used for 5 days my eyes worsened and I called to get a new prescription will never use again
Prescribed to my sons. Works good, make sure you follow the instructions and finish dosage..
